column4: hi, if i have ubuntu 6.10 installed with the default nvidia/beryl combo, can i update saftley to 7.04 without problems using the update-manager ??

hi, if i have ubuntu 6.10 installed with the default nvidia/beryl combo, can i update saftley to 7.04 without problems using the update-manager ?? (or can there be problems like 6.06->6.10 many people had) ?
